newsitem.title: USA: MCI gets Household Intl contract.
newsitem.headline: MCI gets Household Intl contract.

text.p: MCI Communications Corp said Thursday it signed a multimillion-dollar agreement with Household International Inc to continue to provide Household's telecommunications services through the year 2000.

Under the terms of the deal, MCI will remain as Household's primary carrier. The company will provide Household with voice and data communications services, including Household's private phone network.
Household International, based in Chicago, provides consumer financial services.
MCI, based in Washington, provides integrated communications services.
